item.title: Shock as missing South African journalist's decomposed body found
item.description: Human remains, believed to be that of a journalist and his partner, have been found by police.

item.title: US cuts aid to Zambia over 'systematic' medicine theft
item.description: Critical medicines affected by the $50m cuts include Malaria, HIV and TB drugs, the US embassy says.

item.title: Dozens of pro-Palestinian protesters arrested at Columbia University
item.description: The university asked for police help after protesters occupied part of the main library on Wednesday.

item.title: Ukraine labels Russian ceasefire a farce after reports of hundreds of violations
item.description: A three-day truce was called by Vladimir Putin ahead of Russia's World War Two Victory Day celebrations.

item.title: Israel PM 'uncertain' over condition of three Gaza hostages
item.description: Benjamin Netanyahu said he knew "with certainty" that 21 hostages were alive but the status of "three more" were unclear.
